metadata.title: Zhort - URL Shortener & Pastebin
metadata.description: Shorten URLs and share code snippets

footer.supportText: Everything is free forever. To keep it that way, we need your support.

home.subtitle: Fast, secure and free. With
home.whyZhortSubtitle: Everything you need for professional link management

passwordProtection.title: Password Protection
passwordProtection.description: Protect sensitive links with individual passwords for maximum security.

expiration.title: Expiration Date
expiration.description: Automatic deletion after a defined time for temporary links and campaigns.

qrCodes.title: QR Codes
qrCodes.description: Automatic QR code generation for every link - perfect for print and mobile.

analytics.title: Detailed Analytics
analytics.description: Comprehensive statistics on clicks, devices, countries and browsers for each link.

bulkProcessing.title: Bulk Processing
bulkProcessing.description: Shorten multiple URLs at once - perfect for marketing campaigns and newsletters.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Features
enterprise.description: API keys, webhooks, custom domains, A/B testing and more for professional users.

extension.title: Browser Extension
extension.description: Shorten URLs directly from your browser with one click.
extension.installWarning: Since Zhort is not yet listed in the {browser} Store, you need to use developer mode.
extension.step2chrome: Open chrome://extensions/ in the address bar.
extension.step3chrome: Enable "Developer mode" in the top right.
extension.step4chrome: Click "Load unpacked" and select the folder.
extension.step2edge: Open edge://extensions/ in the address bar.
extension.step3edge: Enable "Developer mode" in the left menu.
extension.step4edge: Click "Load unpacked" and select the folder.
extension.step4firefox: Select the manifest.json file in the unpacked folder.

linkForm.customCodeHelper: Only lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores allowed
linkForm.passwordHelper: Link is only accessible with this password
linkForm.validUrlError: Please enter a valid URL (starts with http:// or https://)
linkForm.customCodeLengthError: Short code must be between 3 and 50 characters

auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your experience.

errors.notFoundDescription: The requested page does not exist.
